title: x/build: normal build failures text files should include build type, git rev
body:
The trybot build failure URLs contain the builder type and rev:

e.g.
https://storage.googleapis.com/go-build-log/cd8e2e9b/linux-386_5f49e79a.log

The normal build failure ones are mysterious:

http://build.golang.org/log/d7d65e5a0ed5f47f7ca4171d8ce79eab1c1941f7

It's okay that we don't have all the information in the URL, but the file itself once downloaded should say which builder type and git revision it was at.

/cc @crawshaw
